name: nytimes
text: The University of Kentucky agreed to remove a mural depicting enslaved people working in a field after years of students' objections. But a new lawsuit is challenging the move, and a Black artist who painted a response to the work also wants it to stay. https://t.co/cqRFVDGp64

text: RT @michaelcrowley: “I’ve dealt with every one of the major world leaders that are out there right now.” Biden isn’t known as a foreign policy visionary but says a personal relationships are what counts.  https://t.co/b2ByKcOXnQ

name: nytimes
text: As American sports league move to restart, athletes’ earnings, status and job security could determine who has the ability to sit out and who will see little choice but to play https://t.co/JKhUoXHs2B

name: nytimes
text:
RT @elizashapiro: NYC cannot fully reopen without its public schools. 

The city's 1,800 schools will look radically different this fall, with the likelihood of staggered schedules and social distancing. 

Here's what we know, and what we don't:
